| Property     | Attribute    | Description | Type                            | Default    |
| ------------ | ------------ | ----------- | ------------------------------- | ---------- |

| `scrollable` | `scrollable` |             | `boolean`                       | `false`    |


## Events

| Event          | Description                                                   | Type               |
| -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `bdsTabChange` | bdsTabChange. Event to return value when accordion is change. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
